name: Project Merlin
description: Project Merlin is a modular Web3 ecosystem that integrates decentralized crowdfunding, freelancing, community engagement, and launchpad functions under a unified DAO governance framework. It enables startups and creators to raise funds, find talent, and engage communities transparently through blockchain technology. The ecosystem is powered by the $MRLN utility token, which serves as the backbone for payments, staking, NFT utilities, and DAO participation. Project Merlin aims to build a self-sustaining, community-driven infrastructure where innovation, transparency, and inclusivity shape the next generation of decentralized applications.
